scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:backend && npm run lint:fix:frontend
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:backend && npm run type-check:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage:backend && npm run test:coverage:frontend
scripts.qa:check: npm run lint && npm run type-check && npm run test:coverage
scripts.qa:security: npm run qa:security:backend && npm run qa:security:frontend
scripts.qa:performance: npm run qa:performance:backend && npm run qa:performance:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend
scripts.clean:frontend: cd frontend && rm -rf node_modules dist coverage
scripts.clean:backend: cd backend && rm -rf node_modules dist coverage
